t: Black-Owned Brand Oh Happy Dani Pulls Products from Target Amid Retailer’s Rollback on DEI Initiatives
s: January 29, 2025 - Black-owned stationery and lifestyle brand Oh Happy Dani has officially started removing its products from Target shelves, following the retailer’s decision to roll back its diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) initiatives.
